text:
VOICE (outside
singing)
- The hour-glass is turning!
COLUMBUS
- Silence!
VOICE (singing)
- We wish you a good voyage.
If God so wishes.
COLUMBUS
- Move not nor make a noise. Wait
here for me.
Where is he? He was here... He has
gone.
I will have him looked for: he must
be found immediately..
Or perhaps there was no one in the
cabin. . .
Perhaps I was dreaming..
EHD OF PART OME
